name: Janice Labossiere
description: Janice Labossiere believes in the transformative power of travel. Her favourite experiences (so far!) include a sunrise hot air balloon ride in Cappadocia, snorkeling with sharks in Belize, sledding in Austria, and "singing" karaoke in Japan. Happiest when exploring the streets of a new city on foot, Janice loves soaking up history, culture, and the best cup of coffee she can find. Follow Janice's adventures at instagram.com/jlabossiere -- just be prepared for some cat photos, no matter where she is in the world.
